name: Cube Miner v1.0.0
description:
CUBE MINER                                

-------------------------Instructions--------------------------

-WASD to move your cube

-Hold left mouse to mine or shoot bow

-Earn cash by mining ores

-Shoot underground monsters for cash

---------------------------------------------------------------

Cube Miner is the remake of the Cube Miner Series on Scratch by Legobuzz12. Featuring a story, 5+ unique biomes and music tracks, epic boss battles,and lots of skins and pickaxes

---------------------------------------------------------------

Mine underground while upgrading your pickaxe, shoot underground monsters for cash, and avoid spike and lava in a treacherous journey underground to recover the legendary Infinity Pickaxe from the Supreme Leader - TERMINATOR WALL.

-----------------------    BIOMES   --------------------------

1.Overworld (Plains)

2.Cave

3.Deeper Cave (Crystal Caverns)

4.Even Deeper Cave (Magma Layer)

5.Dungeon

6.Land of Burning Lights

7.The Void

8.Destoryed Factory (Boss Fight)

--------------   BIOMES COMING SOON   ----------------

1.Underground Jungle

2.Lunar

3.Radiations Cave

4.Abyss

5.The Confection

------------------   EPIC BOSS BATTLE   --------------------

Face off against a returning boss that was thought to be destroyed - Ultimate Leader of the Underground!
